import { useState } from 'react'; import './home.css'; import api from "../../api/api" import { useEffect } from 'react'; const Home = () => { const [character, setCharacter ] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ async function showCharacters () { await api.get("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character") .then((response)=>{ setCharacter(response.data.results.slice(0,6)) }).catch((err)) } showCharacters() },[]) return (

  • Butthole Ice Cream Guy

    Alive - Alien

    Interdimensional Cable

    Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate

  • Butthole Ice Cream Guy

    Alive - Alien

    Interdimensional Cable

    Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate

); }; export default Home;
